title: Soulscented Apothecary + Perfumery
description: Soulscented is a spiritual Apothecary, Perfumery, that showcases its Founder, Rachael White's range of Archangel Aromatherapy Perfumes, her services as an Angel Healing Therapist + Coach, Author, Perfumer, Master Aromatherapist and Holistic Herbalist and Teacher. Rachael also offer a selection of Angel Healing Courses.
